title: Structural Metalwork
fullText:
Exposed structural metalwork that is—
• (a) located in an earthed situation; or
• (b) electrically continuous with an extraneous conductive part that is located in an earthed situation,
shall be earthed.

Exception: Structural metalwork need not be earthed if—
• (i) it supports only electrical equipment having double insulation; or
• (ii) it supports only electrical equipment operating at extra-low voltage; or
• (iii) it supports only electrical equipment supplied by a separated extra-low voltage system.
